resources.string: Explore Amsterdam, stroll around the city and discover unique details of the rich history. Historic houses and mansions were often decorated with gable stones, which are carved and painted stone tablets. They gave information about the owner or the business, sometimes straightforward, sometimes through subtle hints or even riddles. Before street names and house numbers were established the location of a house was referred by the gable stone.
Scavenger Hunt: Look for the rabbits

Start the tour and search for specific gable stones. Your missions consists of 10 clues, locate the gable stones and/or other parts of a house as described in the clues. Complete all items, discover hidden gems while emerging in the history of Amsterdam. Explore Amsterdam in an unique and memorable way.
- Start your Mission: work your way thorugh the items
- Locate the gable stones in Map
